price: Àkókò náà súnmọ́. Òṣùpá sì là pẹrẹgẹdẹ (sí méjì).¹
footnotes: 1. Ìyẹn ṣẹlẹ̀ ní àsìkò Ànábì - kí ìkẹ́ àti ọlà Allāhu máa bá a - nígbà tí àwọn ọ̀ṣẹbọ bèèrè fún àmì ìyanu lọ́wọ́ rẹ̀.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
